project.description: Execute lsstswBuild.sh (this is similar to executing rebuild from lsstsw)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Whitespace delimited list of 'refs' to attempt to build. Priority is highest -> lowest from left to right. "master' is implicitly appended to the right side of the list, if not specified.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PRODUCT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Whitespace delimited list of EUPS products to build.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: SKIP_DEMO
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Do not run the demo after all packages have completed building.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: SKIP_DOCS
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Do not build and publish documentation.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
ARGS=()
if [ ! -z "$BRANCH" ]; then ARGS+=('--branch') ARGS+=("$BRANCH") fi
ARGS+=('--build_number') ARGS+=("$BUILD_NUMBER") ARGS+=('--product') ARGS+=("$PRODUCT") ARGS+=('--print-fail') ARGS+=('--color')
if [[ $SKIP_DEMO == "true" ]]; then ARGS+=('--skip_demo') fi
if [[ $SKIP_DOCS == "true" ]]; then ARGS+=('--skip_docs') fi
if [[ $NO_FETCH == "true" ]]; then ARGS+=('--no-fetch') fi
LSSTSW=$HOME $HOME/buildbot-scripts/lsstswBuild.sh "${ARGS[@]}"
